Lord of Vermilion IV: Animated commercials for Square Enix's 4th installment of the arcade-based fantasy collectible card game. The commercials feature various characters talking to the viewer giving backstory to the game (Tokyo 2030 post-apocalypse world due to bio-terrorism), their particular character cards, and demanding the viewer use their powers to their full ability to take back the world.
['Lord of Vermilion III Special Anime Movie', 'Lord of Vermilion: Guren no Ou']
